explains: n. 常态；[化学] 当量浓度；[化学] 规定浓度

sentences.en: A semblance of normality has returned with people going to work and shops reopening.
sentences.cn: 随着人们上班、商店重新营业，表面已恢复了常态。

sentences.en: Life at last returned to some semblance of normality.
sentences.cn: 生活似乎终于恢复了正常。

sentences.en: They are hoping for a return to normality now that the war is over.
sentences.cn: 既然战争结束了，他们希望一切都恢复常态。
